markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs=""
>
[The Owl](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2512)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Stolen Fate</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #191: The Destiny War](/Sources.aspx?ID=199) pg. 76

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** carried

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_The Owl_ represents the wisdom of nature and the natural order. As long as you have _The Owl_ invested, it grants a +2 item bonus to Perception checks made to [Sense Motive](/Actions.aspx?ID=85), [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) checks to [Subsist](/Actions.aspx?ID=27) in the wild, and [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) checks made when you activate this card. This increases to a +3 bonus if you are at least 17th level.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> 1 hour (command, envision, Interact);  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** After spending an hour meditating, you can ask one question of the region's spirits, as if you had just performed a [_commune with nature_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=7) ritual. Attempt a DC 30 Nature check to determine the result.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: The Owl
